body.transcript:
Hello, welcome to Harmony Music School! My name is Lawrence Perez. May I know your name, please?

I'm Deborah Perez, and I'm quite upset with the pricing of your lessons!

I'm sorry to hear that, Deborah. Could you share what specifically is bothering you about our pricing?

I was told the monthly fee was seventy-five dollars, but I got charged one zero zero.

I understand your frustration. Could you confirm the plan you're on? We have Basic, Standard, and Premium tiers.

I signed up for the Standard plan. I want to know why I'm being overcharged.

To help resolve this, may I have your customer ID and the last billing statement date, please?

My customer ID is two zero three six, and the last billing statement was on October fifteenth.

Thanks for providing those details, Deborah. I'll investigate this issue and get back to you shortly.

I appreciate your patience and time, Deborah. I will contact you soon with a resolution. Thank you for reaching out.

analysis.body: In this conversation, Lawrence Perez from a random business discusses pricing with Deborah Perez. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

My customer ID is two zero three six, and the last billing statement was on October fifteenth.

I appreciate your patience and time, Deborah. I will contact you soon with a resolution. Thank you for reaching out.
